subject: Art & Design
title: Font Pairing: The Art of Combination
description: A fast breakdown of Font Pairing: The Art of Combination for builders.

hook.text: Pair two similar fonts and they'll clash like two people wearing the same outfit.

buildup.text: The classic pairing rule: contrast, don't match. A serif headline with a sans-serif body works.

discovery.text: Look for shared proportions: similar x-height and character width create subtle visual harmony.

twist.text: Using more than two typefaces in one design almost always creates visual chaos. Stick to two.

climax.text: Superfamilies (like Roboto + Roboto Slab) are designed to pair perfectly â€” the safest bet.

punchline.text: Great pairings contrast in style but agree in proportions.

quiz.question: What is the safest font pairing strategy?
options: Contrast in style (serif + sans-serif) but match in proportions
Use as many fonts as possible for variety
